item.title: Dwayne Johnson’s ‘The Smashing Machine’ Delivers TKO at Venice World Premiere, 15-Minute Ovation
item.description: Benny Safdie’s A24 film casts Johnson as legendary mixed martial arts and UFC fighter Mark Kerr, who was in attendance at the Venice premiere, as was star Emily Blunt.

item.title: ‘The Smashing Machine’ Review: Dwayne Johnson Delivers the Blows as a Tormented Fighter in Benny Safdie’s Gritty and Downbeat MMA Flick
item.description: Emily Blunt co-stars in the true story of Mark Kerr, a former college wrestler who battled trauma and drug addiction during the early years of the UFC.

item.title: Julia Roberts Is Team Luca Guadagnino as She Arrives at Venice Film Festival
item.description: The Oscar winner arrived wearing a cardigan covered with the face of her latest filmmaker collaborator, while her fellow Venice Film Festival stars also arrived in style this week.
